attributes.action: , no, the Queen, to dissolve this rotton Parliament, tainted by corruption.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Parliament has failed to clean up the expenses system. The Prime Minister has failed to ask the Queen to dissolve Parliament so that a fresh Parliament can be elected. The Queen should now take the initiative and dissolve Parliament herself.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
